title: VR-Based Collaborative Engineering Simulation Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math and engineering concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners engage in collaborative simulations using smartphone-based VR devices, with a focus on accumulating practical engineering problem-solving experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three engineering design principles through collaborative problem-solving in VR environments.
Learners can perform mathematical calculations (area, angle, distance, etc.) with 90% accuracy via simulation-based projects.
Learners can present three or more stages of the engineering problem-solving process through real-time collaboration with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
